snippet: With “In Creases,” danced by New York City Ballet, the choreographer Justin Peck suggests a mature, individual talent.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews performance by New York City Ballet, including the premiere of In Creases by Justin Peck, at the Sarasota Performing Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: With “In Creases,” danced by New York City Ballet, the choreographer Justin Peck suggests a mature, individual talent.

headline.seo: Justin Peck’s ‘In Creases,’ by New York City Ballet
headline.main: A New Work That’s Steeped in the Classic, but Still Individual
headline.print_headline: A New Work That’s Steeped in the Classic, but Still Individual
